animeTitle: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead
animeDescription: Aikawa Ayumu was revived as a zombie by the cute necromancer Eucliwood Hellscythe. After the zany, madcap adventures in the first season of Is This a Zombie? ended, Ayumu thought his life might finally get back to normal, or as normal as it can be for a zombie. However, destiny has other plans for him. Some guys just can't catch a break.   (Source: FUNimation)
animeRelated: ['Kore wa Zombie desu ka?', 'Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? OVA', 'Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead: Hai, Minotake ni Attemasu']
